admin.ratelimiter=Rate Limiter admin.ratelimiter.description=Provides rate limiting services to prevent abusive site grabbing admin.ratelimiter.configuration=Rate Limiter Configuration admin.ratelimiter.configuration.description=Configure rate limiters and mail notifications admin.ratelimiter.report=Rate Limiter Reporting admin.ratelimiter.report.description=View recent abuses exceeding the configured rate limiters
ratelimiter.config.intro=The rate limiting service provides a way to control how fast users can consume your website content and prevent abusive site grabbing. Through this configuration you can define one or more allow consumption rates for different periods of time. All changes are applied immediately for new visitors, while existing visitors continue with their previous configuration until their next visit or application restart. If you delete all limitations, the service is deactivated for all users immediately. Administrators are not affected by the rate limitation and anonymous users are limited by their IP address. ratelimiter.config.ratelimiters=Configured Rate Limiters ratelimiter.config.livetable.limit=Limit ratelimiter.config.livetable.period=Period ratelimiter.config.livetable.overflow=Overflow ratelimiter.config.livetable.actions= ratelimiter.config.error.norights=You should have admin rights to manage this configuration. ratelimiter.config.livetable.limit.requestper=requests    / ratelimiter.config.livetable.overflow.never=Never ratelimiter.config.livetable.overflow.requests=requests ratelimiter.config.page.title=Rate limiter configuration ratelimiter.config.page.intro=This page hold the current rate limiter configuration
RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_unit_DAYS=day(s) RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_unit_HOURS=hour(s) RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_unit_MINUTES=minute(s)
RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_limit=Requests limit RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_limit.hint=Maximum number of requests allowed during the given period of time. Requests are not strictly equivalent to pages. Loading a page requires at least one request, but could generate more requests to load images in the page, display attachments, etc... RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_period=Time period RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_period.hint=The shifting time period taken into account to enforce the above limit. The effective limitation is not to exceed limit/period requests. RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_overflow=Overflow RateLimiter.RateLimiterConfigClass_overflow.hint=Number of requests before incoming requests stop being accounted for the purpose of rate limiting. All requests made in excess that goes over the overflow will be ignored. If empty, all requests are accounted infinitely, which could cause increasing waiting time before an acceptable request could be finally allowed. The overflow should be higher or equal to the requests limit.
